docs.title: mris_preproc
docs.description: Script to prepare surface-based data for high-level analysis by resampling surface or volume source data to a common subject and concatenating them into one file.

docs.title: Output File
docs.description: Save output here.

docs.title: Target Subject
docs.description: Subject to use as the common-space. All input data will be resampled to the surface of this subject.

docs.title: Hemisphere
docs.description: Use hemisphere for source and target surfaces. Can be lh or rh.

docs.title: Surface Measure
docs.description: Use subject/surf/hemi.surfmeasure as input. Implies --srcfmt curv.

docs.title: Label
docs.description: Look in label/hemi.annotname.(annot,mgz) and use mapmethod nnf.

docs.title: Measure Directory
docs.description: Look in subdir instead of surf.

docs.title: Subjects
docs.description: Specify an input subject on the command-line. All subjects must be specified in this way.

docs.title: FSGD File
docs.description: Specify the list of input subjects from the fsgd file.

docs.title: Subject List File
docs.description: List all subjects separated by white space in subjlistfile.

docs.title: QDEC Table
docs.description: Specify list of subjects via qdec table file. Assumes the first column is the "fsid".

docs.title: QDEC Longitudinal Table
docs.description: Specify list of subjects via longitudinal qdec table file.

docs.title: Surface Measure File
docs.description: Specify full path to input surface measure file.

docs.title: Volume Measure and Registration Files
docs.description: Specify full path to a volume file and its registration matrix file.

docs.title: Projection Fraction
docs.description: When sampling a volume onto the surface, sample a fraction of the thickness along the surface normal.

docs.title: Projection Fraction Max
docs.description: When sampling a volume onto the surface, find max along projection for vol2surf.

docs.title: Projection Fraction Average
docs.description: Compute average along projection for vol2surf.

docs.title: No Mask Non-Cortex Flag
docs.description: Do not mask out non-cortex in vol2surf.

docs.title: Session File
docs.description: FS-FAST session file.

docs.title: Directory File
docs.description: FS-FAST session directory file.

docs.title: Analysis
docs.description: FS-FAST analysis.

docs.title: Contrast
docs.description: FS-FAST contrast.

docs.title: CVar Flag
docs.description: Use fsfast contrast variance (cesvar).

docs.title: Offset Flag
docs.description: Use fsfast mean offset (h-offset).

docs.title: Map
docs.description: Use fsfast contrast/map.

docs.title: ETIV Flag
docs.description: Divide each subject's value by the Estimated Total Intra Cranial Volume as found in aseg.stats.

docs.title: FWHM Smoothing
docs.description: Smooth by fwhm mm on the target surface.

docs.title: FWHM Source Smoothing
docs.description: Smooth by fwhm mm on the source surface.

docs.title: Number of Iterations Smoothing
docs.description: Smooth by niters on the target surface.

docs.title: Source Smoothing Iterations
docs.description: Smooth by niters on the source surface.

docs.title: Cortex Only Flag
docs.description: Exclude medial wall.

docs.title: MGZ Format Flag
docs.description: Use mgz format internally.

docs.title: No Jacobian Flag
docs.description: Turn off jacobian correction.

docs.title: Paired Difference Flag
docs.description: Compute paired differences after concatenating all inputs together.

docs.title: Cache Output
docs.description: Cache the output in the specified cache file.

docs.title: Cache Input
docs.description: Use the pre-computed cached data from the specified cache file.

docs.title: Cache Output Only
docs.description: Cache data without actually creating an output.

docs.title: No Prune Flag
docs.description: Do not prune the inputs.

docs.title: Mean Flag
docs.description: Compute the mean of all inputs.

docs.title: Standard Deviation Flag
docs.description: Compute the standard deviation of all inputs.

docs.title: Reshape Flag
docs.description: Reshape spatial dimensions.

docs.title: Surface Registration
docs.description: Use specified surface registration to the common space.

docs.title: Subjects Directory
docs.description: Set SUBJECTS_DIR environment variable.

docs.title: Synthesize Flag
docs.description: Synthesize the input data with white gaussian noise.

docs.title: Temporary Directory
docs.description: Use specified temporary directory.

docs.title: No Cleanup Flag
docs.description: Do not delete temporary files.

docs.title: Cleanup Flag
docs.description: Delete temporary files (default).

docs.title: Log File
docs.description: Specify log file.

docs.title: No Log Flag
docs.description: Do not create a log file.

docs.title: Debug Flag
docs.description: Enable debug mode.

docs.title: mris_preproc
docs.description: Script to prepare surface-based data for high-level analysis by resampling surface or volume source data to a common subject and concatenating them into one file.
